newsitem.title: USA: Novell sues Adtech over trademark.
newsitem.headline: Novell sues Adtech over trademark.

text.p: Novell Inc said Friday it hadc filed suit in the U.S. District Court for the Eastern District of California alleging trademark and trade name infringement by Adtech Network Services Inc.

Novell said the suit alleges that Adtech, based in Ceres, Calif., is fraudulently claiming to be a Novell-authorized reseller and is fraudulently claiming that a certain employee is a certified Novell engineer.

Novell said it has no record of Adtech ever applying to become a Novell-authorized reseller. It also said its records indicate that the Adtech employee in question has taken only one course toward obtaining "certified Novell engineer" status.
An Adtech spokesman declined comment on the suit.
